documents.document: Her: What is your favorite color Him: Beautiful Her: That's not a color Him: Yes it is. It's the color of your eyes.
Sometimes it's love, sometimes it's hate; but either way it's you that's in my head.

Sometimes I wish I could just go back to the past and laugh at myself then.
I made a mistake and I want to do everything I can to fix it... but I can't do anything if you don't give me a chance.
I love you but I hate you. You drive me crazy. But yet for some reason; I still call you my baby.
One of the most peaceful things is, having the one you love fall asleep in your arms.
2Yes you re in his bed, but are you in his heart where it matters?
The moment of regret when you are brought back to reality after hours of onlining. .
I want you to know something, but I can't get the words out, so I'll just let the first 3 words of this sentence explain it...
Why can't our hearts have brains
With every step taken, you're closer to the top of the mountain. With every step untaken, you're one step further. .
Lots of people say they love me, but I don't need someone to say it, I need someone to show it.
If aliens are looking for intelligent life Why the heck are you scared!
Fall in love with someone who deserves your heart, not someone who plays with it.
Love is not to forget but to forgive. Not to see but to understand. Not to hear but to listen. Not to let go but to hold on.
We all have that one dumb friend. And if you can't think of a dumb friend...congratulations you're the dumb friend :).
When you fall in love you feel like you're in heaven...when your heart is broken, all hell is unleashed.
The best things in life are worth waiting for, fighting for, believing in, and just never letting go of.
Sometimes I wonder what my life would be like with out you. Then I thank God I only have to wonder.
You're not a photographer. You just have an overpriced camera.
Remember: love is not in how you know her, love is in how you understand her.
The dreadful feeling when you're stuck alone at home, and no one's free to go out. .
When you finally decide on something after a long hesitation, everything will seem much clearer.
If you walked away from that someone you love...and they DIDN T chase after you...rest assured, you made the right decision.
I'm not falling in love, I'm falling into pieces.
How can I forget you when you're always on my mind How can I not love you when you're controlling my heart
You've got an attitude that just screams for an adjustment.
One tear drop can speak in any language.
Don't fight for someone who won't fight for you, cry for someone who won't cry for you, or stay with someone who doesn't appreciate you.
Remember, people only rain on your parade because they're jealous of your sun and tired of their shade.
Maybe I'm over you. Maybe I've moved on. Maybe I like someone else, but maybe, I'm just a really good liar...
It s better to let someone walk away from you rather than walk all over you.
Sometimes the truth actually does raise its ugly head, but you can t see it because it s hiding behind lots of pretty little lies.
What I feel for you is more then love...it's beyond words.
There comes a time in life when you have to let go of all the pointless drama & the people who create it.
Love is when you look into someone's eyes and see everything you need.
Don't let how you feel make you forget what you deserve.
The annoying moment when you're dying to go out but can't find anyone to go out with.
"Moving on"...just two words that take about a second to blurt out, but can take forever to achieve...
I can t make you love me,want me,or understand me/..all I can do Is hope that someday you will.
Some people are like clouds, when they disappear, it s a brighter day.
The hardest things to say are the words that mean the most.
GUYS: love her, spoil her, wine her, dine her, kiss her, wife her, appreciate her, respect her, make her smile, make her happy.
If you find love, I mean real love, well, you don't give it up without putting up one hell of a fight.
Just promise me that you'll never promise anymore...
It seemed better in my imagination.
I may be able to forgive, but I can NEVER forget.
Angry people do stupid things.
Once I start disliking someone, EVERYTHING they do is irritating to me
Whether life is beautiful or disaster, it depends on how you treat yourself.
I didn't fall for you, you tripped me and just walked away.
Somewhere in the world tonight, someone's falling in love for the first time.
Don't forget to respect yourself and love others. Don't let anyone push you into something that is not you.
Because I expected; I was disappointed.
Dear mom, Please stop telling me not to play with my food. You spent the first years of my life pretending it was an airplane.
Congratulations! You have succeeded in hurting a girl who truly loved you.
I do it because I can, I can because I want to, I want to because you said I couldn't.
I'm willing to wait for you, to be you're number one, because I know you're ohh so worth it.
My love is electric ;)
If you can't carry a conversation don't talk to me. I'm not gonna talk to myself while you give one word answers.
I hate people who don't hear me out when I need to explain something.
Old enough to know better, young enough to do it anyway
My heart says "Yes" But my mind says "What if...."
A man who treats his woman like a princess is proof that he has been born & raised in the arms of a queen.
I'd rather argue with you, than kiss someone else.
Ladies, if a girl ever steals your man, there s no better revenge than letting her keep him. REAL MEN can t be stolen.
They say if u love someone enough they r worth all the pain in the world but if it was really love u wouldn't have to be feeling pain at all
The awkward moment when you walked ahead of your friends and realised that no one is following you. .
Learn how to love and how to let go.
People who hurt you, teach you the greatest lessons in life.
I can only love one person at a time, and right now its me.
I was never afraid to tell you I love you... I was just afraid you wouldn't say it back.
Why is it that the one who makes me the happiest, is the one who is already taken.
Why is it called a crush? It s because that s what happens to your heart when you find out they don t like you back...
You are everything I never knew I wanted.
I would be lying if I said you stepped out of my dreams and into my life... My dreams were never this wonderful!
Sometimes I lie awake at night, and I ask, 'Where have I gone wrong' Then a voice says to me, 'This is going to take more than one night.'
We know what we are, but know not what we be.
Love is like pi - natural, irrational, and very important.
A million stars and a million dreams. He's the only star I see and the only dream I dream.
You asked me whose life was more important - yours or mine and I answered "mine" ; you walked away angry not knowing that you ARE my life.
Hey Everybody! Sorry for being away for so long, Emergency at home, but I m back now so tell all your followers ;)
I keep blaming her for taking you away from me, when the truth is you could've fought for me, but instead you let me go as if I was nothing.
If you spend too long holding on to the one who treats you like an option, you will miss finding someone who treats you like a priority.
A real girl isn't perfect and a perfect girl isn't real.

If you love someone, be brave to tell them...otherwise be brave enough to watch them be loved by someone else...
Isn't it funny how someone can really make you mad just by yelling "BINGO!"
She made one mistake in her life...he said he would never hurt her and always love her,and she believed him.
He keeps my feet on the ground and my head in the clouds.
I'm selfish for wanting you all for myself but I can't help the way I feel about you. I want you and only you.
Life is a math equation. In order to gain the most, you have to know how to convert the negatives into positives.
I'm multi-talented, I can talk and piss you off at the same time.
The awkward moment when you realize you're wrong in an argument, but you keep arguing anyway.
I hope you know how much you mean to me...
We'd laugh at the stars and we'd share everything, too young to notice and too dumb to care. Love was a story that couldn't compare
